flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
A Pokémon formed by three others.
It busily carries sweet floral
honey to VESPIQUEN.

It collects and delivers honey to
its colony. At night, they cluster
to form a beehive and sleep.

The trio is together from birth.
It constantly gathers honey from
flowers to please VESPIQUEN.

At night, COMBEE sleep in a group of
about a thousand, packed closely
together in a lump.

At night, COMBEE sleep in a group of
about a thousand, packed closely
together in a lump.

Ce trio inséparable depuis la
naissance récolte du miel
pour satisfaire Apireine.

The trio is together from birth.
It constantly gathers honey from
flowers to please Vespiquen.

Ce trio inséparable depuis la
naissance récolte du miel
pour satisfaire Apireine.

The trio is together from birth.
It constantly gathers honey from
flowers to please Vespiquen.

This Pokémon is a set of three.
When they sleep, they gather up
and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.

This Pokémon is a set of three.
When they sleep, they gather up
and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.

うまれたときから　３びき　いっしょ。
ビークインに　よろこんでもらうため
いつも　はなのミツを　あつめている。

태어났을 때부터 3마리가 함께한다.
비퀸을 기쁘게 하기 위해
항상 꽃의 꿀을 모으고 있다.

Ce trio inséparable depuis la naissance récolte du miel
pour satisfaire Apireine.

Dieses Trio ist von Geburt an zusammen.
Fleißig bringt es Blütenhonig zu Honweisel.

El trío se forma al nacer y se pasa la vida recogiendo
miel de las flores para satisfacer a Vespiquen.

Il trio è insieme dalla nascita. È sempre impegnato
a portare il nettare dei fiori a Vespiquen.

The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers
honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

生まれたときから　３匹　一緒。
ビークインに　喜んでもらうため
いつも　花のミツを　集めている。

あつめた　ミツを　すみかに　はこぶ。
よるには　たくさんの　ミツハニーが
かさなって　はちのすになり　ねむる。

모은 꿀을 거처로 운반한다.
밤에는 많은 세꿀버리가
겹쳐져 벌집이 되어 잠잔다.

Il récolte le nectar et l’amène à la colonie.
La nuit, les Pokémon de cette espèce s’assemblent
pour bâtir une ruche et s’endormir.

Es sammelt Honig und bringt ihn in seine Kolonie.
Nachts bilden sie einen Bienenstock und schlafen.

Almacenan miel en su colonia. Por la noche, se apiñan
para formar una colmena y dormir.

Porta il nettare raccolto dai suoi simili. Di notte si
riuniscono per formare un alveare e dormire.

It collects and delivers honey to its colony.
At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

集めた　ミツを　住処に　運ぶ。
夜には　たくさんの　ミツハニーが
重なって　ハチの巣になり　眠る。

うまれたときから　３びき　いっしょ。
ビークインに　よろこんでもらうため
いつも　はなのミツを　あつめている。

태어났을 때부터 3마리가 함께한다.
비퀸을 기쁘게 하기 위해
항상 꽃의 꿀을 모으고 있다.

Ce trio inséparable depuis la naissance récolte du miel
pour satisfaire Apireine.

Dieses Trio ist von Geburt an zusammen. Fleißig bringt es
Blütenhonig zu Honweisel.

El trío se forma al nacer y se pasa la vida recogiendo miel de
las flores para satisfacer a Vespiquen.

Il trio è insieme dalla nascita. È sempre impegnato a portare
il nettare dei fiori a Vespiquen.

The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers
honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.

生まれたときから　３匹　一緒。
ビークインに　喜んでもらうため
いつも　花のミツを　集めている。

あつめた　ミツを　すみかに　はこぶ。
よるには　たくさんの　ミツハニーが
かさなって　はちのすになり　ねむる。

모은 꿀을 거처로 운반한다.
밤에는 많은 세꿀버리가
겹쳐져 벌집이 되어 잠잔다.

Il récolte le nectar et l’amène à la colonie. La nuit,
les Pokémon de cette espèce s’assemblent pour bâtir
une ruche et s’endormir.

Es sammelt Honig und bringt ihn in seine Kolonie.
Nachts bilden sie einen Bienenstock und schlafen.

Almacenan miel en su colonia. Por la noche, se apiñan para
formar una colmena y dormir.

Porta il nettare raccolto dai suoi simili. Di notte si riuniscono
per formare un alveare e dormire.

It collects and delivers honey to its colony.
At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.

集めた　ミツを　住処に　運ぶ。
夜には　たくさんの　ミツハニーが
重なって　ハチの巣になり　眠る。

いつも　いっしょの　３びきだけど
それぞれの　はなのミツの
このみは　びみょうに　ちがう。

언제나 3마리가 같이 있지만
좋아하는 꽃의 꿀은
저마다 미묘하게 다르다.

３隻一直都在一起，
但每一隻對花蜜的
喜好卻略有不同。

Ce trio est inséparable et pourtant, leur goût
pour le nectar diffère légèrement.

Dieses Trio ist immer zusammen, aber jedes
von ihnen hat leicht andere Vorlieben, was
Blütenhonig angeht.

Este trío no se separa jamás, pero cada uno tiene
sus propios gustos en cuanto a néctar se refiere.

I tre componenti non si separano mai.
In fatto di nettare, ognuno ha gusti
leggermente diversi.

The members of the trio spend all their time
together. Each one has a slightly different taste
in nectar.

いつも　一緒の　３匹だけど
それぞれの　花の　蜜の
好みは　微妙に　違う。

３只一直都在一起，
但每一只对花蜜的
喜好却略有不同。

よあけから　ひぐれまで　ミツを
あつめつづける。　すべては
むれと　ビークインの　ためだ。

새벽부터 저녁때까지 꿀을
계속 모은다. 모든 것은
무리와 비퀸을 위해서다.

從早到晚都在採集花蜜。
這一切都是為了
自己的族群和蜂女王。

Du lever du soleil à la tombée de la nuit,
il récolte du nectar pour Apireine et sa colonie.

Sie sammeln von der Morgendämmerung bis zum
Sonnenuntergang unentwegt Blütenhonig für
Honweisel und die Kolonie.

Recolecta néctar de sol a sol para entregarlo a la
colonia y a Vespiquen.

Raccoglie nettare dal tramonto all’alba
per il bene del gruppo e di Vespiquen.

It ceaselessly gathers nectar from sunrise to
sundown, all for the sake of Vespiquen and
the swarm.

夜明けから　日暮れまで　蜜を
集めつづける。　すべては
群れと　ビークインの　ためだ。

从早到晚都在采集花蜜。
这一切都是为了
自己的族群和蜂女王。

They swear fealty to a queen Pokémon and work diligently to
gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.

ability.effect:
This Pokémon has a chance of picking up honey after each battle.  This chance starts at 5% and rises another 5% after every tenth level: 5% from level 1–10, 10% from 11–20, and so on, up to 50% from 91–100.

This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.
ability.short_effect: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.

ability.effect:
This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.

Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as seismic toss, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.
ability.short_effect: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their accuracy to 0.8×.

move.effect:
Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Randomly selects and uses one of the user's other three moves.  Use of the selected move requires and costs 0 PP.

This move will not select assist, bide, bounce, chatter, copycat, dig, dive, fly, focus punch, me first, metronome, mirror move, shadow force, skull bash, sky attack, sky drop, sleep talk, solar beam, razor wind, or uproar.

If the selected move requires a recharge turn—i.e., one of blast burn, frenzy plant, giga impact, hydro cannon, hyper beam, roar of time, or rock wrecker—and the user is still sleeping next turn, then it's forced to use this move again and pay another PP for the recharge turn.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
move.short_effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

move.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
move.short_effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.
